a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Change in cereal production, yield and land use, World, 1961 to 2018
Population and cereal production, yield and land use figures are indexed to the year 1961 (i.e. 1961 = 0).
Source: OWID based on World Bank; and UN FAO
